languages.text: "Касс, мне тут шепотки наболтали, что ты ночами рыдаешь в подушку. Я им, конечно, не верю, но ты в последнее время и правда расклеилась".
"Cass, I've heard whispers that you've been crying into your pillow at night. I don't believe them, of course, but you have been really down lately."
languages.original_text: "Касс, мне тут шепотки наболтали, что ты ночами рыдаешь в подушку. Я им, конечно, не верю, но ты в последнее время и правда расклеилась".

traits.locale_text: "Cass, I've heard whispers that you've been crying into your pillow at night. I don't believe them, of course, but you have been really down lately."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “小卡，那些低语告诉我你常常在睡前哭泣。我当然不会相信这种鬼话，但你最近真的很消沉。”
languages.original_text: "Cass, I've heard whispers that you've been crying into your pillow at night. I don't believe them, of course, but you have been really down lately."

traits.locale_text: “小卡，那些低语告诉我你常常在睡前哭泣。我当然不会相信这种鬼话，但你最近真的很消沉。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Cass, j'ai entendu dire que vous vous endormiez en pleurant tous les soirs. Ce n'est qu'une rumeur ridicule, bien sûr, mais il est vrai que vous n'avez pas l'air dans votre assiette, dernièrement. »
languages.original_text: "Cass, I've heard whispers that you've been crying into your pillow at night. I don't believe them, of course, but you have been really down lately."

traits.locale_text: « Cass, j'ai entendu dire que vous vous endormiez en pleurant tous les soirs. Ce n'est qu'une rumeur ridicule, bien sûr, mais il est vrai que vous n'avez pas l'air dans votre assiette, dernièrement. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Cass, he oído susurros de que has estado llorando en la cama por las noches. No creo sus palabras, claro, pero sí que has estado de bajón últimamente».
languages.original_text: "Cass, I've heard whispers that you've been crying into your pillow at night. I don't believe them, of course, but you have been really down lately."

traits.locale_text: «Cass, he oído susurros de que has estado llorando en la cama por las noches. No creo sus palabras, claro, pero sí que has estado de bajón últimamente».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「カシア、夜な夜な枕に向かって泣いているという噂を聞いたわ。もちろん信じているわけじゃないけど、最近落ち込んでいるようだから」
languages.original_text: "Cass, I've heard whispers that you've been crying into your pillow at night. I don't believe them, of course, but you have been really down lately."

traits.locale_text: 「カシア、夜な夜な枕に向かって泣いているという噂を聞いたわ。もちろん信じているわけじゃないけど、最近落ち込んでいるようだから」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Cass, ich habe flüstern hören, dass Ihr des nachts in Euer Kissen weint. Ich glaube dem Flüstern natürlich nicht, aber Ihr seid in letzter Zeit sehr niedergeschlagen."
languages.original_text: "Cass, I've heard whispers that you've been crying into your pillow at night. I don't believe them, of course, but you have been really down lately."

traits.locale_text: "Cass, ich habe flüstern hören, dass Ihr des nachts in Euer Kissen weint. Ich glaube dem Flüstern natürlich nicht, aber Ihr seid in letzter Zeit sehr niedergeschlagen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Cass, I've heard whispers that you've been crying into your pillow at night. I don't believe them, of course, but you have been really down lately."

languages.text: "Cass, fısıltılar diyor ki... Geceleri yastığına kapanıp ağlıyormuşsun. Ben onlara inanmıyorum tabii ama bu aralar bayağı bir durgunsun."
languages.original_text: "Cass, I've heard whispers that you've been crying into your pillow at night. I don't believe them, of course, but you have been really down lately."

traits.locale_text: "Cass, fısıltılarım diyor ki; geceleri yastığına kapanıp ağlıyormuşsun. Ben onlara inanmıyorum tabii ama bu aralar bayağı bir durgunsun."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
